column1: Little Goat Diner////We started with the goat chili cheese fries- yeah
column2: I could die happy eating these. The fries alone are salty and crispy
column3: but when you add the cheese sauce and goat chili it's heaven. We also had the crab dip as an appetizer- so creamy and cheesy
column4: and the ritz crackers are a very nostalgic taste for me.
